name: Telegram
description: Send alerts to a Telegram chat

USE_TELEGRAM.help: Enable sending alerts to a Telegram.
USE_TELEGRAM.label: Use Telegram

TELEGRAM_CHAT_ID.help: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel.
TELEGRAM_CHAT_ID.label: Chat Id

TELEGRAM_SEND_SILENTLY.help: Sends the message silently. Users will receive a notification with no sound.
TELEGRAM_SEND_SILENTLY.label: Send Alert Silently

TELEGRAM_COUNT_TIME.help: Period of time during which we count silent alerts
TELEGRAM_COUNT_TIME.label: Silent alerts period of time (in sec)
